title: Unusual loss streak?
body:
I was G5 last may but now I am S2. 

Around early Mary, I had a crazy streak of loss that was worse than any loss streaks I had. And because of that, I am demoted to S2. 

Did you have similar experience?

replies.body: Well people usually say take breaks. I've recently found out it's because you'll most likely get put with the same teammates as last game. Also tilt does mess with your performance. It sucks to be human XD.
